```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(RefManageR)
library(lubridate)
library(gt)
library(gtExtras)

```

```{r}
#| column: screen-inset

pm <- local({
  q <- '(Luu, Michael[Author]) AND (Cedars-Sinai[Affiliation])'
  
  RefManageR::ReadPubMed(q, retmax = 999)
  
}) |> 
  as_tibble() |>
  mutate(date = my(paste0(month,'-', year))) |> 
  select(date, journal, title, doi) |>
  arrange(desc(date)) |> 
  mutate(date = format(date, '%B-%Y'))

pm <- pm |> 
  mutate(
    doi = glue::glue('<a href=https://doi.org/{doi}>{doi}</a>'),
    doi = map(doi, \(x) htmltools::HTML(x))
  )

pm |>
  DT::datatable(
    style = 'bootstrap4',
    class = 'compact',
    colnames = c('Month-Year', 'Journal', 'Title', 'DOI'),
    filter = 'top'
  )
```
